title: Is Creedence Clearwater Revival’s ‘Fortunate Son’ About Al Gore?
subtitle: President Donald Trump was mocked for the “absolute irony” of playing the anti-privilege song ‘Fortunate Son’ at 2020 campaign rally in Michigan.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The Creedence Clearwater Revival song "Fortunate Son" was inspired by Al Gore, Jr.
